body: This package mirrors the Homebrew/Linuxbrew package found [here](https://github.com/jppelteret/homebrew-science-extras/blob/master/paradiseo.rb). Unfortunately the source repository and packages are in a bit of a state, so the use of a specific git revision is recommended. Patches have been applied to make it compile on both OS X and Linux.
title: Added package for Paradiseo.
